Title: Visarg Soneji | Personal Webpage
Name: Visarg Soneji
Description: Undergraduate student from BITS Pilani. Passionate about Computer Technology, Cognitive Modelling and Open Source.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a Computer Science major on week days,a content-creator on weekends and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already working, doing photography, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently an Intern at SAP Cloud Platform Core

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona

ProjectsStartLine: Some of the side projects I did can be found here :
CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
